divs: Sighting DetailsI was droping off my boyfriend after watching breaking dawn when he tells me wtf is that at first there were 2 lights and 1 just disappered so we followed the light and it disappered while I'm recording it then another ball shapped light appears and I'm still recording it would change directions very cool then that disappeared we saw about 3 of them and I was lucky to record it all. I gave become a believer I couldn't sleep but in a way I feel like this was a dream that I manage to catch on my phone. I have 4 videos of this I posted them on youtube
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kearny
There were no other sightings in Kearny on or around November 19th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I have videos it was bright and would disapper I just became a believer
